title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Finding Nemo
production_studio: Pixar Animation Studios, Walt Disney Pictures
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
production_studio: Walt Disney Pictures, Jerry Bruckheimer Films
description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate 'Captain' Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: Lost in Translation
description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

title: Mystic River
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

title: Oldboy
description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
description: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: Love Actually
production_studio: Universal Pictures, Working Title Films, DNA Films
description: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

title: Elf
production_studio: New Line Cinema, Guy Walks Into a Bar Productions
description: Raised as an oversized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

title: Big Fish
description: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

title: School of Rock
description: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn his class into a rock band.

title: X2: X-Men United
description: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.

title: The Last Samurai
production_studio: Warner Bros., The Bedford Falls Company
description: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

title: Something's Gotta Give
description: A swinger in his 60s finds love with the mother of his young girlfriend.

title: Cold Mountain
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to his sweetheart.

title: Seabiscuit
description: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted the spirits of the nation.

title: 21 Grams
production_studio: Focus Features, This is That Productions
description: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

title: Monster
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

title: Bad Santa
description: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
description: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.

title: The Matrix Revolutions
description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

title: X2: X-Men United
description: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.

title: Something's Gotta Give
description: A swinger in his 60s finds love with the mother of his young girlfriend.

title: Cold Mountain
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to his sweetheart.

title: House of Sand and Fog
description: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with the new owners.

title: The Cooler
description: In an old-school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss's consternation.

title: In America
production_studio: Fox Searchlight Pictures, Hell's Kitchen Films
description: An Irish immigrant family adjusts to life in the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen, New York City.

title: The Triplets of Belleville
description: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved dog team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

title: Matchstick Men
description: A con man with an obsessive-compulsive disorder finds his life thrown into turmoil when he discovers he has a teenage daughter.

title: Freaky Friday
description: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

title: Identity
description: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

title: American Splendor
description: The story of Harvey Pekar, a file clerk at a VA hospital in Cleveland who becomes a cult comic book author.

title: The Station Agent
description: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to find himself reluctantly drawn into the lives of his neighbors.

title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
description: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

title: Underworld
description: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

title: The Italian Job
description: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
description: Hitman 'El Mariachi' becomes involved in international espionage involving a corrupt CIA agent and a psychotic Mexican drug lord.

title: Bad Boys II
production_studio: Columbia Pictures, Don Simpson/Jerry Bruckheimer Films
description: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of ecstasy into Miami.

title: Thirteen
production_studio: Fox Searchlight Pictures, Working Title Films
description: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime.

title: The Barbarian Invasions
description: A man who is dying of cancer is reunited with his estranged son and a group of his old friends.

title: Intolerable Cruelty
description: A successful divorce attorney finds his life turned upside down when he falls for a beautiful but manipulative woman.

title: Shattered Glass
description: The true story of Stephen Glass, a young journalist who fabricated a series of stories for The New Republic.

title: Pieces of April
description: A young woman who has been estranged from her family invites them to her small New York City apartment for Thanksgiving dinner.

title: Open Range
description: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

title: Touching the Void
description: The true story of two young climbers who attempt to reach the summit of Siula Grande in Peru in 1985.

title: Capturing the Friedmans
description: A documentary that examines the strange case of a Long Island family who were accused of child molestation in the 1980s.
